seo.title: MiniMax Hailuo 02 – Text & Image-to-Video (512p/768p, 6–10s, Silent)
seo.description: Fast, physics-aware 6–10s clips at 512p/768p from text or one image. Reference + end frame support, silent output, budget-friendly pricing in MaxVideoAI.

overview: MiniMax Hailuo 02 in MaxVideoAI: short, cheap, physics-aware clips at 512p/768p in 6 or 10 seconds. Text or image input, optional end frame, silent output, and wallet-based pricing for rapid drafts and loops.

bestUseCases.title: Best use cases
items: Draft motion ideas before Sora/Veo/Kling/Wan finals
Animate storyboards, renders or styleframes into quick clips
Test transitions, camera moves or physics-heavy moments
Build experimental loops and background plates for reels/openers
Budget-friendly multi-variant campaigns with dozens of clips

technicalOverview.label: Inputs
technicalOverview.body: Text prompts; optional reference image; optional end frame

technicalOverview.label: Audio
technicalOverview.body: Silent output (no native or uploaded audio)

technicalOverview.label: Pricing
technicalOverview.body: Budget-friendly; wallet-based live pricing in Generate

promptStructure.title: Text-to-Video with MiniMax Hailuo 02
promptStructure.quote: [Duration] second [aspect ratio] shot of [subject] moving through [environment]. Camera [movement] while [secondary motion] reacts naturally (wind/fur/debris). Style: [realistic/stylized]. No text or logos.
promptStructure.description: Keep prompts short and motion-forward: subject in motion, environment, camera, physics, style, and a negative prompt.
steps: Aspect & duration (6 or 10 s) plus negative prompt

tips.title: Tips & limits
items: Use 1–3 sentences; overlong prompts can introduce artifacts
One main subject/environment/effect per clip for clarity
Upload reference + end frame to lock composition and landing
512p for fastest/cheapest drafts; 768p for social-ready output
Plan to add audio in post or pair with Wan/Sora/Veo clips

compareLink.label: Compare MiniMax vs Pika vs Veo →

prompts.title: Windy rooftop drift (10s, 16:9)
prompts.prompt: 10s 16:9 glide across a stylized city rooftop at night; coat and hair react to gusts, camera floats past neon signs, puddle reflections, no text/logos/UI.

prompts.title: Fox sprint physics sketch (6s, 16:9)
prompts.prompt: 6s 16:9 shot of a red fox sprinting through a dense forest on a windy day. Camera follows low behind; leaves/dust swirl; realistic fur motion; stylized colors; no text/logos.

faqs.q: Why choose MiniMax over premium engines?
faqs.a: Great motion/physics at lower per-second cost, ideal for volume ads, explainers and experiments without burning budget.
2–3 sentences covering subject, environment, camera and physics; one main idea per clip.
No. Hailuo 02 outputs silent video; add sound in post or pair with audio-capable engines.
Use Hailuo 02 for drafts at 512p/768p, then upscale or rerun the prompt in 1080p engines (Veo, Kling, Wan, Sora 2 Pro).

custom.heroDesc1: Generate fast, physics-aware drafts at 512p/768p from text or a single image, with optional end frame to lock the landing.
custom.heroDesc2: Pick 6 or 10 seconds, choose 16:9/9:16/1:1, and get silent clips ready for storyboards, loops and motion tests.

6 or 10 second clips tuned for social intros and motion tests

custom.whatTitle: What MiniMax Hailuo 02 Actually Is in MaxVideoAI
custom.whatIntro1: MiniMax’s headline model for short sequences with strong physics and prompt adherence.
custom.whatIntro2: In MaxVideoAI it’s wired as a fast, silent draft engine at 512p/768p.
whatFlowSteps: 2. Select Text → Video or Image → Video.
3. Pick 6 or 10 seconds, resolution (512p/768p) and aspect ratio.
4. Optionally upload a reference image and/or end frame.
5. Paste a short, motion-focused prompt (add physics if needed).

specSections.title: Duration & Output
items: Durations: 6 s or 10 s
Resolutions: 512p or 768p
Routes tuned for speed and cost

specSections.title: Aspect Ratios
items: 16:9 – horizontal
9:16 – vertical
1:1 – square

specSections.title: Inputs & File Types
items: Text prompts (English, Chinese, etc.)
Reference image: PNG/JPG/JPEG/WebP/GIF/AVIF (~25 MB)
Optional end frame to land on a specific layout

specSections.title: Audio
items: Silent-only output
Plan to add audio in post or pair with audio engines

specSections.title: Pricing
items: Budget-friendly; live per-job prices visible in Generate
Compare against Pika, Veo Fast, Wan 2.5 before rendering

custom.promptIntro: Short, motion-driven prompts: subject, environment, camera, physics, style, negative prompt.
custom.promptSkeleton: [Duration] second [aspect ratio] shot of [subject] moving through [environment]. Camera [movement]; [secondary motion] reacts naturally. Style: [realistic/stylized]. No text/logos/UI.
custom.promptSkeletonNote: One idea per clip; keep wording tight.
custom.imageTitle: Image-to-Video with MiniMax Hailuo 02 (+ End Frames)
custom.imageIntro: Animate boards/renders/concepts quickly with optional end frame.
imageFlow: Prompt for camera + physics; specify landing on the end frame.
imageWhy: Looping backgrounds for streams or hero sections
custom.multishotIntro1: 6s: 1–2 beats; 10s: 2–3 beats max in one environment.
custom.multishotIntro2: Focus on physics-driven transitions in a single setting.
multishotTips: Beat 1: establish; Beat 2: motion/transition; Beat 3: hero frame
Keep to one environment/style per clip
demoPrompt: 10s vertical shot drifting through a neon-soaked city street at night, stylized but grounded in real physics.
Camera floats forward above puddles, reflections rippling as people/umbrellas pass in soft focus.
Wind gusts send trash and steam swirling; painterly look, saturated colors, no text/logos.
demoNotes: Easy to loop as a background
Silent output ready for your own track
strengths: Reference + end-frame support to lock composition
boundaries: 6 or 10 s max; stitch for longer edits
Always silent; add sound in post or via audio engines
Tiny on-screen text/UI unreliable—overlay critical copy
custom.tipsFooter: Hailuo 02 is your fast, physics-savvy sketch engine—use it to explore motion before finalizing in higher-end models.
safetyRules: No real public figures or celebrities
No explicit sexual content or sexualized minors
Avoid hateful, harassing or extremist content
Don’t impersonate real people without consent
Provider + MaxVideoAI moderation may block or alter outputs
safetyInterpretation: Use for fictional, brand-safe stories and stylized worlds
custom.safetyNote: Respect guardrails; Hailuo is for professional, ethical use.
custom.comparisonTitle: MiniMax Hailuo 02 vs Pika / Veo / Kling / Wan
comparisonPoints: MiniMax Hailuo 02: silent 6–10s at 512p/768p, strong physics, low cost
Veo 3.1 Fast: 4–8s with optional audio at 720p/1080p
Wan 2.5: 5–10s with native/uploaded audio and multiple tiers

faqs.a: Strong motion/physics at lower cost; ideal for volume ads and experiments.
Short, motion-forward: subject, environment, camera, physics; one idea per clip.
No. Outputs are silent; add sound in post or via audio engines.
Draft in Hailuo 02 (512p/768p), then upscale or rerun in 1080p engines like Veo/Kling/Wan/Sora 2 Pro.
